sentence.Network_en: The secret of the machine lies in the aerodynamic shape of the frame.

sentence.Network_en: Aerodynamic forces and moments are strictly speaking functionals of the state variables.
sentence.Network_cn: 严格说来,气动力和力矩是状态变量的泛涵.

sentence.Network_en: These effects appear to be negligible with respect to aerodynamic coefficients.
sentence.Network_cn: 就空气动力系数这方面来说,这些影响似乎可以略去.

entry.def: If something such as a car has an aerodynamic shape or design, it goes faster and uses less fuel than other cars because the air passes over it more easily.

example.ex: The secret of the machine lies in the aerodynamic shape of the frame.
example.tran: 该机器的精妙之处在于其构架呈流线型。
